case.state: Huh? Lotte, who was this? I thought I told you about the game...?
Oh! You're here tonight, Constanze!? Yay!
I’m here to inspire the world with magic!
I'm here! I made it! I only got a little lost.
Wait a second, aren't we supposed to pretend this is our first game, or aren't we?
It's nice to see someone recognizes a famous witch!
A researcher? Do you know about the Wagandea tree, Cynthia!? I helped fix that!
I guess not, Constanze. Maybe she wanted a game with more mushrooms?
Hm... It is pretty weird.
Oh, Lotte, did I take a wrong turn on the leyline? I thought we were going to be playing strip poker tonight?
Witch problem? What kind of world would have a problem with witches?
Yay! It's so nice to see all of you! But who's this ~player~ person?
Hm... I dunno if you can, Sayaka! I'm pretty good at numbers. And I'm the only witch here, so...
I've got my Shiny Rod, Sayaka. Don't worry, I'll keep you safe and entertained! No need to get slicy slicy stabby stabby over it.
Y'know, Panty, I was thinking that but wasn't gonna say anything.
I-I might be at the wrong table! Can girls even-- I-I guess I could try it, it can't be that different!
...Darn, do people not even recognize me as myself?
Oh, you're here too, Professor Croix? That's kind of weird, I haven't seen you in forever!
Well, anyway, let's have fun!
Well, I'm a witch, Emi! Let's teach you the difference tonight!
Duel Monsters!? Is that like the Shiny Chariot Card Game?
...You dress like and act like a witch, how was I supposed to know you aren't a witch?
Pfft. I'm not some little witch anymore! This'll be fine, Constanze! I've got you to back me up, anyway!
Yay, another witch! Raven, you are a witch, right?
Ryuko, are you talking to your sword? I actually got to ride a super fast broom that looks a lot like your weapon!
Sheena, you're dressed in purple and are going to use magic? Did you graduate from Luna Nova too?
You're on, Megumin of Crimson Demon Village! I'm Atsuko Kagari of Luna Nova! And you can call me Akko!
I'm happy to be here! You must be a great witch! I didn't even see how you took off those glasses!
Whoa! A Therian! Dust, I got so many questions for you, you wouldn't even believe-- but you're going to by the end!
Are we playing with a golem tonight...? Or is this statue just enchanted...? Hm...
Wow! There's so many mages and witches and sorcerers and demons and spirits and spellcasters and enchanters and... we're all so magic tonight!
Oh wow! So many monsters tonight. I think you'll love my performance!
Oh! I'm going to be playing a show for the fairies tonight, that's great!
Oh! Lots of other witches tonight! This'll be super fun! I bet you've never seen a show like mine!
Yay! I was told this’d be a great place to show off some magic for an interested audience!
Yay! This’ll be fun!
Ready, set, go!
What? I've studied a lot of Greek magic at Luna Nova, including the philosophies! ...And lots of boobs. Seriously. The girls there have no reservation about naked cavorting.
Don't care.
Ugh. ~cards~, I guess.
Yay! ~cards~!
Well, that last hand was fine, but gimme ~cards~ this time!
Perfect! Just ~cards~!
Okay okay okay! I got this! ~cards~!
Oh, crap! ~cards~ or this’ll get bad!
Hummm… ~cards~?
Ha! Time for the best hand ever, ~cards~!
Gimme ~cards~!
Ew! ~cards~ that aren’t sticky! Please!
Metamorphie… how do you transform ~cards~? Oh! Right! Metamorphie papiesse!
Metamorphie… how do you transform ~cards~?
...Whatever.
It’s not on purpose! I swear it’s not on purpose! You think it’s on purpose, don’t you?
Uwwwh... I'm still hungry. Are you sure there's no snacks here besides drinks?
Haha! Yay!
Yay! Not as good as a Chariot limited card, but still a great hand!
よし!
Ahem! Now this is a good hand!
Haha! Yay! I got a little lucky.
So, anyone here have any particular heroes? Uh… oh! Yeah! My cards are really good so I’m just asking questions!
There we go, this is a great hand! See, I warned you not to pick a fight with me!
Oh, don’t be embarrassed, whoever’s gonna lose! I had a few bad hands, too!
I must be some sort of a genius to be this good at cards!
I did it! I got good cards, and I’m not going to lose this hand! What if I tried… Tia freyle! Annnnnnnnnnn- -oppppppe. Darn.
I can do this!
A world filled with magic is so much fun!! I’m glad that I can have a hand like this!
I’m not gonna start doubting my potential and hard work now! Come on! Bring it!
As long as I have my magic, I won’t believe that I can lose!
Don’t forget, I’m still a witch, and I’m still in this!
Phew! I was worried I’d have to do something sneaky!
They're okay, I guess.
Hmm… what would Chariot do…?
Hmmm…! This is pretty good!
All right! Any requests for my next spell?
Dunno about you guys, but I’d never use magic to cheat. I want to show you only good things about magic.
Huh? Sorry, I was… paying attention to other stuff! Yup! What's the deal with witch hats, anyway? I'm always forgetting mine.
Yera retoure! Aw… that was supposed to let me rewind time… These are alright, I guess…
Of course I have more than a pair! You don’t have to act like I’m a bad player here, you know!?
Torurira-ra-ra! Eh, hehe. Sorry, sorry, I thought you’d all be a bit more... asleep this round… I’m not so sure about my hand is all, so don’t be mean!
Y’know, I’m not really from a witch family, but I’ve picked up a few tricks… like this! Heheh.
Don’t think I’m gonna give up so easily! I’ll win this! Just you watch!
This is better than having to do a bunch of laundry by hand, but still only okay...
Uwaaah! Okay, okay, I have a plan to get out of this! I can't tell you what! But trust me, I have a plan!
Ohhh not this hand again! So mixed…
Cards, why are you being such a pain in the butt! You aren’t my broom!
You’re gonna have to work a little harder to see me naked!
Not great, but I’m not gonna give up so easily! I'm going to be one of the greatest witches ever, and that means working at it!
Uhhh… Oh! Cool yeah yeah yeah these are fine! It's not like I've ever been totally wrong...
Is there some sort of secret to this…? Hmmm!
Oruihon deance…! I wasn’t whispering a spell to improve my hand. I don’t know why you’d imply that I’d cheat…!
I think I can make this wo-- wait a second, I can’t exactly make a bluff here, can I?
Oh... dang it... c'mon...!
Hmm hmm hmm! Whaaaat? I'm just... stretching my magic...!
You’ve already seen me naked in a bunch of different shapes. Can we go ahead and skip the next part?
Really, I think it makes sense that you’ve basically gotten to see a bunch of people naked since I can cast transformation magic, so I shouldn’t… awww… fine, if I lose…
No matter what happens, I'll see this through!
Is it a good hand, is it a bad hand? Well, when I use my hands, you'll know for sure!
This sucks.
I, like, literally wanna die because of these.
Aww! This was supposed to be fun!
Awwwh, can I use a spell to change these…? No…? Grumble...
Who would want these?! These are like that juice that gives you frog legs!
Uwaaaaah! Come on!
Dang… Well, if I practice a lot, I’m sure to get it eventually!
This hand’s uh… great! Probably, definitely, for sure!
AAAAAAA!
Please, please, please work!
Ooooooohhh, come on! I’m begging you, cards, please be better!
The only time I’ve had a hand this bad was when I got troll grime under my fingernails…!
Oh look at me, I’m so smart, I’m good at poker. Says someone that’s not me.
This bites...
This sucks! My hands are gonna fall off before I win with this!
Torirara faciesse! Um. Wait a second, you can all still see me, can’t you…?
Oh no… Did I mess something up again?
Please, hand, I’m begging you to be good!!!
T-this isn’t hopeless, right?
Y-you know, I want to make the world gasp in surprise, but showing off my body wasn't the biggest part of that plan...
This is kinda embarrassing… I don’t really think… No! You know what! I’ll do it! I’ll be brave and I won’t take shortcuts!
Just so we’re clear, I have to, um. Play with myself if I lose, right? It’s okay if I use magic then, isn’t it?
Wait! I got a great idea! Metamorphie vestesse cyfnewid: Emi and Natsuki! Whoa, uh--! Not fans? Okay! Hold on, hold on, I can fix it!
That... makes a lot of sense. I can also shapeshift mine, but I think they're pretty great as is.
Hmm! Wait! Wait a second! Natsuki, you can’t have ~player~ and Pit! That’s not fair! I saw them at the same time you did! Since you got greedy, I’m going to seduce both of them!
Seduce an Earth girl...? Gosh... I don't know anything about that. Even if I liked a girl, I wouldn't know how to... can girls even... like, do it?

Oh! That's easy! You just gotta use a love spell! Like, bake your hair into a pie. I hear boys love hairy pies. Or mix some blood into their drink. I learned it from Sucy... but I never used a spell like that.
Yeah, I've been getting kind of thirsty and they look full and untouched... after everything Sucy's poisoned me with, I'd probably be fine...?

Wait, Lotte! If Professor Croix is here... does that mean Professor Ursula will be playing too?
That seems... m-maybe a bit... I guess we're all adults and full-fledged witches...
Darn. But it looked so cool!
I'm totally going to win, so I'll take you up on that, Mulan!
You sure waited for me to be almost out to challenge me. But I'm not going to just back down! You're on, Mulan!
Chazz, look! It's totally real! People not believing in it is the problem!
Huh!? What the heck! I thought for sure I banished that spirit! Darn it!
Hmmm…! Someone really brave and smart and really good with magic! I'd love to fall in love with someone like that!
Uhm. Like… in the butt, Sei? I don’t know… I think with enough magic or shapeshifting anything is possible… but does it really feel good? I don't wanna hurt...
I get it! You're here to harvest the arousal energy from this game, aren't you? That's way better than making people upset and harvesting that!
Larochell? Le-arkul? La-- dang. You have just the worst amount of L's and R's. I'm going to just call you Laraerae.
Of course not! I just said you were pretty smart, Mae! That's the opposite of dumb, y'know?
We didn't really get to talk about Japan, Sayaka, but you look Japanese with that wild pubic hair. Whenever I go home, people always get way too personal about how I do mine.
Well... you definitely look Japanese, Sayaka! I went to school in Europe, so, I like to keep my hair down there more neat. It's cute that you just let it go wild, though!
Yeech. Anything but vodka. I’ve had enough potatoes to last a lifetime… oh! What’s this thing called a Shine Spark!? That! That!
Hell yeah! I get why you have protagonist energy now, Komi-san! But we're going to have to finish strong together!
I'm guessing you were a gambler? That's why you have such a fun time at a game like this, right?
Estelle, are you a witch of some kind? I get a magic-y feeling from you, but I can't figure out what type of magic you use.
Seriously! You were super cute with messy hair!
Ooooo-kayyy, Hanako. I definitely don't think you're a Witch of the Primal Chaos. Those burn marks are definitely just an accident. Riiiiight.
I'm not dumb. You don't need to rub it in, Ini. Unless you want to rub yourself.
But you can't, can you, Ini? Ha! Who's the dumb one now!? It's Ini! Duh!
Talk schmalk. You lose, I win; you're a liar, I'm a genius. We allllll know how it goes.
Kyu, I think I kinda like this guy Andrew, but I think I also kinda like this girl Diana too. What am I supposed to do?
Lotte, if you aren't sure, I can change you back... but if you want to stay like that, I think it's a great look!
Hmm... besides, how would you even be bad at masturbation? Like, you only cum once?
You look a little... nervous. Why don't you try reading some of your fanfic if you lose, Lotte?
O-ho! I see what Natsuki’s doing! And what she’s wearing! You’re pretty sneaky, Natsuki, so it’s lucky it makes you look even sweeter than a strawberry tart!
Hmm… Just… Er… studying away here! Like a powerful sorceress! Yep! (He’s kinda a stereotypical hero, so I should… I wish I had guidance on this, Chariot!)
Y’know, Pit, I’m pretty great at cards. Er, at least some card games. Anyway, if you lose before me, how about you let me summon you to teach you how to play better?! It’s a challenge!
You know, Pit, I think I’ve heard of an eggplant wizard, but I’m certainly seeing a different kind of eggplant right now…
Hey, you! Man with the wings! Did you mess up a transformation spell too? Don’t worry, I’m good at fixing those! C’mere!
Where can I get one of those, Ryuko?! I love my transformation magic, but that's so cool! I could really do hero stuff!
Of course I can hear him talking! Lotte's way better, but what kind of witch would I be if I couldn't do the basics, Ryuko?
Ohhh! That makes total sense! You're not a hipster, and dead on the inside! You're a zombie, and dead on the outside! Gosh! I get it!
Hm... you know, Sakura, maybe if you guys slowly introduced Franchouchou as being zombie idols, it would go a long way to accepting people who are mortally challenged!
You know, I've never heard of Mitakihara City. Is that in Japan somewhere...?
Sayaka! We got so caught up in talking about witches and magical girls and spirits and magic that we didn't even get to talk about Japan!
Hmmm… I’m gonna win, Pit! But I’m a gracious winner! So if you just keep being brave and stuff, why don’t I summon you later? For um. Poker lessons…? And stuff?
Hmmm.... This is pretty close, Pit! I’m gonna write down my spell signature so you can contact me on crystal ball. Y’know, in case we need a rematch!
Hm... it depends where I do my show, Syrenne, but that could be cool. Are you guys used to not killing monsters, though?
W-whoa... like... anything anything?
Hey, Elesa, I guess now's a good time to ask. Your hair definitely wasn't part of your headphones, but how do you get it like that? Magic?
I... about sliding down your underwear... I would kind of like that, but for some reason I want your thighs on my face and my mouth... um... s-sorry, too much?
Hmph. I don't think I believe you. Sure, witches might lean on spirits to power up our gear, but... we don't make them fight each other like boxers!
Hmm... why didn't she take off her jacket first...? What's her gameplan...? What is this big protagonist energy I sense...?
Wait-- how did you keep the hat on, Dust?
Oh! I just thought it was a code name or something. You're like a golem, right, Florence?
I'd say it was a good experiment, anyway. You look really cute like this!
Oh. Okay! That's fine. Totally fine. Cool cool cool. I'm almost weirdly offended how quick you were to shoot me down, y'know...
Constanze, did you invent those spat-hose? What are those? They're super cute! What do they do?

I'm actually really good at biomaterial chemistry. It's how I can transform so well!
Also, that's really cool of you to be so forward. I always thought you were amazing, but I like this side of you-- as a friend!
Adventures!? I love those! I've had to do all kinds of stuff. I recently played a show in Australia! Everything was kind of upside-down though, so I did my set in reverse order.
But my eyes are red too... are they supposed to be scary, Mae?
An angel? Pfft. Maybe from an underwear catalogue!
A Hex Maniac, N...? I'm not really into hexes, to be honest, but I also think it's "sex appeal," not "hex appeal," you know?
Hmm... Komi-san, you're really excited to masturbate, huh? You seem so hopeful! Well, I don't mind having an easier time winning!
Hmm... okay, Leggy, you want to match the numbers on the cards. The more matches you have, the better off you are.
I think the colors are helpful if you get all five to be the same type. I'm not reaaaaaaaaally sure, though...
The higher the number, the better the card, Leggy!
Whoa, Komi-san! You have your own narrator? And we already know your name? Wow!
I told you, you're my rival for this game! I'm not gonna lose, Ryuko!
Metamophie vestesse: Emi! Hm... awfully citrusy! Weird choice, but kinda... kinky...?
S-sure, Lotte, whatever you say. It's none of my business, and it's not like we'd ever kiss like you and Amanda. ...And Barbara, apparently.
Well, for a girl who seems sooooo confident, you sure brought a lot of friends--your magic armor, your best friend...
Don't worry, Lotte, she wasn't wearing them. She needed them for a potion or something weird like that.
Not at all! I want to learn everything about Chariot! If she likes doing that stuff, it must be really fun!
Hmm... I wonder how fast I am. Can I use magic, Emi?
Hmm... I guess you could just forfeit if you'd rather not take stuff off.
Hm... I could use Murowa but I'm mostly good at physical transformations, and some illusions. I could try if you wanted!
Nope! Not even a little evil! Mischevious, sometimes. But evil, never! I want to use magic to inspire people, Navi!
Oh that's a tough one... hm... I love pie, though... oh, and tarts.
Hm. I guess that makes sense. I like simple panties myself. I can always just use magic to transform them if I need a sexy pair.
Hm... what do you think ~player~ promised her? Maybe a jacket...?
Where'd she get touched... like... her booooobs...?
(~player~'s cute... but if Tharja's so dedicated, it feels kind of wrong to sweep ~player~ away...)
Maybe you should share that dream...? Y'know, play it up for the audience?
Metamophie vestesse: Emi! Huh! Kinda a weird choice, but kinda kinky, right?
A completely above-board wager, Ribbon Girl? I'm in! A believing witch never gives up!
...Are you okay, Amy? I tried to fix it but... is what you really need just a hug...?
Hey, Sakura, I've known one zombie who was just driven to find his daughter. Does your love of dancing keep you reanimated?
Sakura, you aren't one of those boks, are you? You know, the spitting ghouls?
I'm really glad you're so... well, you, Sakura! They say that the dark matter that animates undead slowly causes them to lust for vengeance against the living!
The sexiest thing I can do...? Well, if you find me sexy, and I do myself, that kind of counts, right...?
The sexiest thing I can do? Hm... with magic? I've never tried any sex magic... it's suuuper complicated. I can do a bunch of sexy outfits, though!
O-oh, no, those are regular white cotton. I do find them really easy to transform, though!
Of course Santa is real! How do all the presents get there if he's not!?
Nonsense! I can learn magic from anyone, anytime, anywhere, Dust!
...You know, I came here thinking about another thing that looks just like that, but now I'm weirdly hungry. I should probably eat something myself...
Akko is fine. It's not a kid's name, and I'm a real witch. I'll show you, Nat...suki.
やれやれ? うわー！私たちは日本のスピーカーがそんなにたくさんいるとは思わなかった！
Erufuda, could you... maybe put those fries away? The smell of potatoes is a little nauseating...
Hmph. I have plenty of skill to go with my potential. I also really like my sidereal magic, thanks!
I don't get why you're so embarrassed, Lotte; it's not like I haven't seen you naked before.
Professor, is it still okay if we play this together? And is it still okay if I call you Professor, even though you kind of got fired?
Hm... as long as it doesn't cause another big rocket, Professor, I trust you not to do bad guy stuff?
Kamina, you're really big on believing in yourself, right? Me too! I think encouraging people is just the absolute best thing anyone can ever do!
Hey, Kamina, I had a question: what's up with your sunglasses? Are they some kind of magic item? I'd never give up Shiny Rod, so I figured...
Kamina, I had another question! What do your tattoos mean? They're neat, but I can't find any magic in them.
Well, even if you aren't, this'll be fun! I always like to see new types of magic!
So... you specialize in explosion magic? That's so cool! I mostly do transformations, but I do know a few evocations too!
Chazz! Most of my friends are tired of me kicking their butts at cards... you might be pretty good at it though!
I-I don't know what it was, but I guess you could show me, if you wanted?
And... yeah, Jessie! I love going to the beach! It's awesome to come home feeling sun-soaked, right, Jessie?
Hmph. Goth stuff can be cool too, Jessie. I was thinking about that.
Or... en... di...? Hm... is that the spider-like girl who hangs out in the foyer sometimes? But my transformations are magic!
Like... my mana? Sure! But everyone goes through that!
Do you like it when people have big swords, Jessie?
You're a pretty famous performer, right, Jessie? I'm glad my magic is impressing you! Any suggestions? I don't always know what I'll change into, but I always like to put on a great show!
I thought ladies in your line of work could be sorta... jaded. The fact I'm impressing you means I'm doing great, right?
Huh. So that set wasn't really your thing, was it, Jessie? Well, that's okay! I get the feeling you'll like the next one-- if you can get me to lose!
I try and be flattering with my transformations, y'know? Maybe if you copy me for stuff, that's flattering in its own way, right, Jessie?
N-no... not those seven words, Tharja. The Seven words of Arcturus!
And Panty, that final performance...? Well... I hope it'll impress you! I hope the transformations were at least good... what's that thing people like... foreplay? Yeah! Good foreplay!
You're acting real insecure, Orendi. Have you not been practicing your transformations? I really have to work at it, you know.
Don't worry! Even if Orendi's upset, I'm still going to put on a show, everyone!
Aww, c'mon, Sheena, you know to round out the loss, you have to masturbate, don't you?

Love spells and potions are kind of Sucy's area of expertise but... I heard if you add your blood to their drinks, or bake a pie, that works? Or maybe you need to let them... err... finish in you? Love spells are complicated!
Bring it on, Ribbon Girl! Let's put on a show!
Um... so... Emi... you've tried anal... Sei seems into it... b-but I've never tried that! Is... did you like it?
What are you talking about, Mae? Is this about how I lost my hat?
Um... s-sorry, Amy? I'm not quite sure I follow... do you mean like, do I have some kind of issue?
Huh. What were we talking about? Something about how cool magic is, right? That must have been it!
Um... So... what's with the lemons, Emi? I feel like it was... um... an impactful experience.
Hm... I love stuff like they play at parades! Big music with lots of bands and brass and stuff! Yeah!
Oh… well, I’m good at working at things, but I think I’d rather focus on magic than boys or girls…
I-I can imagine it being surprising but... well, I've been wrong before, so I could mayyybe give it a go...?
Just don't pinch too hard, Jessie!
Um... w-well, n-not every day...
Whaaaat!? Japanese girls sound totally normal! It's the girls in the west thare are grunting and stuff, Jessie! It's weird!
I-I just had to cook and peel so many potatoes at Luna Nova... you can hardly.... urp. Please, no!
Cynthia, you were asking earlier about how many witches are at my school, right? There's about 100 witches a class... so not many, but there's more of us every year!
Cynthia, you also wanted to know about Shiny Chariot, right!? She's the best! She uses a lot of illusion and kinetic magic! It's like a fireworks show and acrobatics all at once!
This is Claimh Solais or like I call it, the "Shiny Rod!" It's an ancient tool used to open and close mana gates! It's a suuuper important piece of witch history, you know?
Oh! You should check out San Miguel, the City of the Sun! It's not only got super nice weather, it's also got a rich history of magic!

W-well, to answer your question, Mulan, maybe a few times. Sometimes people like if you look a little different, but never as like... a mouse or something like that. I think I'd probably die, and magic can't fix that!
You know, Emi, there's all kinds of sports at Luna Nova! Broom racing, ritual dance, sprite dueling, and then there's that magical tag thing...

Emi, you asked about disabilities... It's funny, magic can do a lot of good for people. I know blind people apparently are lots better at certain types of magic, but I think deaf people would have a hard time saying the right words.
I'm... not really all that experienced, but... why are people even into that sort of stuff? I guess it has to feel good, right?
Dark secrets...? Mmm... nope, I'm pretty much what you see is what you get. I'm not even good enough at magic to use the really dark stuff.
You know, I think I really do all of this for my family. They supported me no matter what, and if you think about it, friends are kinda like family, because you adopt them and they adopt you!
Lights on, duh! If there's no light, I can always make some, anyway!
I don't think people should lie to each other... but... I guess life's not always that simple...
I... t-that's kind of a silly question! I-I mean, it's not like you need to do it more than once a day... or even daily! ...But you could...!
A million dollars? That's obvious, I'd donate it back to Luna Nova! They made me the witch I am, so why wouldn't I make a... scholarship for girls like me?
Of course you'd let people see each other. Without eyes, they'd have to only use scrying magic. That's kind of a dumb question, Jessie.
I've only watched it once, because a friend complained that women in Japanese adult videos sound super weird compared to Western ones... Obviously! You don't speak Japanese!
Isn't the sex number 69? But that seems like kind of a lot...
I... don't think I'd like that... I want to feel special, you know? I think I'd be worried I wasn't doing it right...
You know, I tried dating an Efreet boy once, and he always tasted like smoke and ash, so it's probably okay with me? As long as they stop lighting me on fire. That's no fun.
Mistakes are how we learn! It doesn't matter how dumb, people are the best magic in the world, so that's why it's important to make mistakes!
Oh… you tried that potion from the magic item cafe, didn’t you, Tsuyu! The one that gives you frog legs!
So... Galatea, what would you do if you could have a job?
Do you not eat, Galatea? If you've seen a painting or a sculpture of food, what was most appealing...?
So... are you an actual model? What's a Galatea, besides your name?
So, I can clearly use magic, but... I don't think you're actually magic. Would you prefer to be magical or technology...? Professor Croix actually uses both, so you can pick that too, I guess.
Can I call you a golem, or is animate the correct term?
You know, I can probably whip up a different outfit for you, if you know what you want, Galatea... so um... do you?
A good witch, her dark counterpart, an innocent maiden, and a gunslinger. Wait a second! I've heard of this one before!
Sucy said that there might be some cool magic here… I’m... kind of doubtful about that… But all the more reason to inspire the rest of you!
I know you’re expecting the last Word of Arcturus, right? Well, it’s a pretty special one to me, so I’m saving it for last!
I know the Seven Words are pretty obscure witch lore to begin with, so I hope you don’t mind waiting a bit for the last one, ‘kay, you other witches?
You know what! I really can do this! Phaidoari Afairynghor! You can’t always get what you dream of, but you do get what you work hard for!
I got this! Really this time. Time to be a bit more patient with the game...! Mayeneb dysheebudo!
Sybilladura lelladybura! I may not need my broom or Shiny Balai here, but I can use what I’ve learned and what only I can do to get better. I’m gonna win this!
Lyonne! I know it’s kind of a short one, but it’s one of my favorites! I’m thankful for the time all of us have gotten to spend here together! But now I’m gonna kick your butts!
Ehehe, I guess being naked in front of other people is a way of connecting with them. I’m kinda getting into this whole naked thing! Anyway, time for my spell! Phasansheer shaerylla!
